ContainerInsights.^description: You have {$COUNT} ECS clusters without Container Insights enabled. Container Insights provides detailed monitoring metrics and logs for containerized applications, helping with performance monitoring and troubleshooting.

CapacityProviders.^description: You have {$COUNT} ECS clusters without capacity providers configured. Capacity providers help manage cluster auto scaling and optimize resource utilization across EC2 and Fargate.
CapacityProviders.shortDesc: Configure capacity providers for better resource management

ExecuteCommandLogging.^description: You have {$COUNT} ECS clusters without execute command logging enabled. Logging ECS Exec sessions helps with security auditing and compliance requirements.
ExecuteCommandLogging.shortDesc: Enable execute command logging for security auditing

ExecuteCommandEncryption.^description: You have {$COUNT} ECS clusters without KMS encryption for execute command sessions. Encrypting ECS Exec sessions protects sensitive data transmitted during debugging sessions.
ExecuteCommandEncryption.shortDesc: Enable KMS encryption for execute command sessions

ClusterUtilization.^description: You have {$COUNT} ECS clusters that appear to be empty or underutilized. Consider consolidating workloads or removing unused clusters to optimize costs.
ClusterUtilization.shortDesc: Review cluster utilization and consolidate if needed

ServiceLogging.^description: You have {$COUNT} ECS services without proper logging configuration. Configuring logging helps with application monitoring, debugging, and compliance requirements.

NetworkSecurity.^description: You have {$COUNT} ECS services with network security issues such as missing security groups, public IP assignment, or improper subnet configuration. Review network settings to ensure proper security.
NetworkSecurity.shortDesc: Review and fix network security configuration

AutoScaling.^description: You have {$COUNT} ECS services without auto scaling configured. Auto scaling helps maintain application availability and optimize resource usage during varying load conditions.
AutoScaling.shortDesc: Configure auto scaling for ECS services

HealthChecks.^description: You have {$COUNT} ECS services without proper health checks configured. Health checks ensure that only healthy tasks receive traffic and help maintain application availability.
HealthChecks.shortDesc: Configure health checks for ECS services

TaskSecurity.^description: You have {$COUNT} ECS tasks with security issues such as running as root user, privileged mode, or using host network mode. Review task definitions to follow security best practices.
TaskSecurity.shortDesc: Review and fix task definition security settings
